title: Yuvraj singh

coverImg.altText: Yuvraj Singh appointed as Ulysse Nardin watch brand ambassador

summary: Yuvraj Singh (born 12 December 1981) is an Indian international cricketer, who plays all forms of the game. An all-rounder who bats left-handed in the middle order and bowls slow left-arm orthodox, Yuvraj is the son of former Indian fast bowler and Punjabi actor Yograj Singh.
